hub.title: Setup TaDIY Hub
hub.description: TaDIY Hub will be created automatically with default settings. You can configure global settings through the Hub device entities.

room.title: Add Room
room.description: Configure a new room for climate control.

data_description.room_name: Choose a unique name for this room.
data_description.trv_entities: Select one or more climate entities (TRVs) to control in this room.
data_description.main_temp_sensor: Select the primary temperature sensor for this room (optional).
data_description.window_sensors: Select binary sensors to detect open windows or doors (optional).
data_description.outdoor_sensor: Select an outdoor temperature sensor for weather-aware control (optional).

error.room_already_exists: A room with this name already exists.
error.no_hub_found: No hub found. Please create a hub first.

abort.already_configured: This TaDIY Hub is already configured.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one hub can be configured.
abort.no_hub_found: No TaDIY Hub found. Please add the integration first to create the Hub.

room_config.title: Room Options
room_config.description: Configure basic room settings. Advanced settings are available through device entities.

data_description.room_name: Choose a unique name for this room.
data_description.trv_entities: Select one or more climate entities (TRVs) to control in this room.
data_description.main_temp_sensor: Select the primary temperature sensor for this room (optional).
data_description.window_sensors: Select binary sensors to detect open windows or doors (optional).
data_description.heating_curve_slope: Higher value = higher target temp at lower outdoor temps.

add_mode.title: Add Custom Mode
add_mode.description: Create a new custom mode. Mode names will be converted to lowercase. Maximum 10 modes total.

data_description.mode_name: Choose a name for the new mode (e.g., vacation, party, guests)

remove_mode.title: Remove Custom Mode
remove_mode.description: Remove a custom mode. Default modes (Normal, Homeoffice, Manual, Off) cannot be removed.

init_hub.title: Manage TaDIY Hub Modes
init_hub.description: Manage custom operating modes for your heating system. You have {room_count} room(s) configured.

data_description.trv_entities: One or more climate entities (TRVs) to control.
data_description.main_temp_sensor: Primary temperature sensor for this room.
data_description.window_sensors: Binary sensors to detect open windows/doors.

edit_schedule.title: Edit {schedule_name}
edit_schedule.description: Configure time points and target temperatures. Format: HH:MM - Temperature (e.g. 06:00 - 21.0)

data_description.min_heating_rate: Lower limit for learned heating rate (°C/h).
data_description.max_heating_rate: Upper limit for learned heating rate (°C/h).

error.invalid_schedule_format: Invalid schedule format. Use HH:MM - Temperature
error.is_default_mode: This is a default mode and already exists.
error.already_exists: A mode with this name already exists.
error.mode_limit_reached: Maximum number of modes reached (10 total).
error.add_failed: Failed to add mode. Please try again.

abort.hub_not_configurable: Hub settings are managed through device entities. Use the Hub device controls to configure global settings.
abort.coordinator_not_found: Hub coordinator not found. Please reload the integration.
abort.no_custom_modes: There are no custom modes configured. Only default modes (Normal, Homeoffice, Manual, Off) exist. You can add custom modes from the Hub Options menu.

force_refresh.name: Force Refresh
force_refresh.description: Forces an immediate refresh of all room data and sensor readings.

reset_learning.name: Reset Learning Data
reset_learning.description: Resets the learned heating rate data for one or all rooms.

room.name: Room Name
room.description: Name of the room to reset learning data for. Leave empty for all rooms.

set_hub_mode.name: Set Hub Mode
set_hub_mode.description: Sets the operating mode for the hub and all rooms.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The desired hub mode (normal, homeoffice, vacation, party).

boost_all_rooms.name: Boost All Rooms
boost_all_rooms.description: Activates boost mode for all rooms simultaneously.

set_heating_curve.name: Set Heating Curve
set_heating_curve.description: Manually sets the heating rate for a room (overrides learned value).

room.name: Room Name
room.description: Name of the room to configure.

heating_rate.name: Heating Rate
heating_rate.description: Heating rate in degrees Celsius per hour.
